SERVER_ERROR: Utilise ceci seulement dans la groupe Clash & Harmony.
ADMIN_ERROR: Cette fonction a besoin un permission plus élévée.
COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: Il y a une erreur avec cette fonction.
MAINTENANCE: Il y a une probleme avec moi-meme. Attend pour un petit peu, s'il vous plait.
SLASH_COMMAND_ONLY: Cette fonction peuve seulement etre utilisé comme un commande slash.
DM_ERROR: Cette fonction ne peut pas etre utilisé dans les conversations privée.
PERMISSION_ERROR: Cette fonction a besoin un permission plus élévée.
DATA_LOCKED: Tu ne peu pas utilisé cette commande pendant que tu es dans un échange.
BLOCKED: Tu ne peu pas utilisé le robot.
NO_VANITY_ROLES: Vous n'avez pas des roles de vanité!
VANITY_DESC:
Here is a list of all your purchased roles.
A red circle indicates the role is inactive, a green circle the opposite.
TUTORIAL_DESC:
Welcome to the bots tutorial.
This bot is designed as a reward for the users of this server, both in their participation & engagement with the bot as well as activities in the clan.

To proceed with the tutorial, use the buttons below.
TUTORIAL_DESC_1:
This bot features a mod-mail system.
To use it, DM the bot with a message that you would wish to send to the staff of the Clash & Harmony clans.
You may also add a category.
TUTORIAL_DESC_2:
Profile cards can be rendered using the command `!profile`.
Here's a diagram showing the components of the player card:
TUTORIAL_DESC_3:
Points are earned through two main methods:
 • The monthly reward (/monthly)
 • Various clan-related events
You can spend your points on card customization options or roles using `/shop`.
TUTORIAL_DESC_4:
Player cards can be customized using the command `/set`.
You need to purchase the reward using points through `/shop` before using them.
TUTORIAL_DESC_5: You can set a custom status that will be displayed on your profile card for others to see. To set one, use the command `/status`. Please note that statuses have a 60 character limit.
TUTORIAL_DESC_6: You can view details such as the price, description, and image from any reward by using `/info [reward name]`.
TUTORIAL_DESC_7: To view every usable command, you can use `/help`. From there, a message containing all commands will be shown.
NO_TRADE_BOT: Tu ne peut pas échangé avec un robot.
NO_TRADE_SELF: Tu ne peut pas échangé avec toi-même.
TRADE_REQUEST_DESC:
Press the "accept" button below to accept the trade request.
You have 60 seconds to accept or deny the request.
TRADE_REQUEST_NOTE: Your trade will start once your partner accepts!
TRADE_TIMED_OUT: Il n'y a pas plus de temps pour accepté l'échange.
TRADE_MAX_ITEMS: Il y a un maximum de 8 objet dans un échange!
TRADE_NO_MORE_ITEMS: Vous avez pas plus des objets!
TRADE_SELECT_ADD_ITEMS: Choisi les objets pour ajouter ici!
TRADE_ITEMS_ADDED: Les objets été ajouté au l'échange!
TRADE_NO_REMOVE_ITEMS: Il n'y a pas des objets pour enlève!
TRADE_SELECT_REMOVE_ITEMS: Choisi les objets pour enlève ici!
TRADE_REMOVE_ITEMS: Please select the item(s) you'd like to remove from the trade:
TRADE_ITEMS_REMOVED: Removed the items from the trade!
TRADE_POINTS_PROMPT: Please type the amount of points for the trade.
TRADE_POINTS_INVALID: Invalid points amount. You must have enough points, the points must be above zero or you didn't type a number.
TRADE_POINTS_SET: {0} points will be added with the trade.
SUGGESTION_MIN: Your suggestion should be 20+ characters to avoid low quality suggestions.
SUGGESTION_MAX: Your suggestion should be under 1500 characters due to Discord limitations.
SUGGESTION_TITLE_MIN: Your title should be 4+ characters to avoid low quality suggestions.
SUGGESTION_TITLE_MAX: Your title should be under 50 characters due to Discord limitations.
SUGGESTION_EXAMPLE_MIN: Your example should be 20+ characters to avoid low quality suggestions.
SUGGESTION_EXAMPLE_MAX: Your example should be under 750 characters due to Discord limitations.
SUGGESTION_IMAGE_FORMAT: Your image URL must end in one of: `.jpeg`; `.jpg`; `.gif`; `.png`.
SUGGESTION_IMAGE_ERROR: There is likely an error with your image.
SUGGESTION_CHANNEL_ERROR: The suggestions channel was unable to be fetched.
SUGGESTION_NOTE_ADDED: Added a note to the suggestion.
SUGGESTION_STAFFNOTE_SET: Set a staff note to the suggestion.
SHOP_DESC:
You have {0} points right now.
To select a category, use the buttons below.

PAY_NO_BOT: You can't give your points to a bot.
PAY_INVALID_NUMBER: You need to provide a valid number!
PAY_COOLDOWN: You need to wait at least 2 weeks between your first interaction with this bot and now in order to send points.
PAY_USER_BROKE: You don't have enough points! You would need {0} more points to confirm this transaction.
PAY_SUCCESS: You gave {0} points to {1} ({2} points left).
MONTHLY_COOLDOWN:
You can't claim your monthly bonus for another {0}d {1}h {2}m.

When you claim your monthly bonus, there are a few things that influence the output:
You always will get 20 free points.
Harmony & Clash Members get +20 points added on.
Nitro Boosters to this server get +50 points added on.
You also can get up to 10 random free points.
MONTHLY_CLAN_MEMBERSHIP: • **+20** points for being in the clan
MONTHLY_NITRO: • **+50** points for being a Nitro Booster
MONTHLY_CONCLUSION: In total, you earned {0} points. You can use this command again next month!
LIST_DESC: To select a category, use the buttons below.
LIST_CONCLUSION: To customize your profile card, use `!set`.
HELP_DESC: Here is a list of every command currently accessible.
FOUNTAIN_NO_POINTS: You need to have a point to drop it into the fountain.
FOUNTAIN_SUMMARY: You dropped a point into the fountain...
FOUNTAIN_BIG_REWARD:
The fountain finally notices you. It thinks you should use it more, and so rewards you with better odds.
It's been a while, but the fountain aknowledges you. If you use it more, the odds may be more in your favour.
FOUNTAIN_NO_REWARD: The point drops with a small splash.
It must be broken, or something.
The water doesn't seem to react.
FOUNTAIN_REWARD: {0} points jump out of the water.
The fountain acknowledges your contributions and rewards you with {0} points.
After a few moments, {0} points fly out.
A figure jumped out of the water and gave you {0} points in return.

...
...
...
After a few moments, {0} points materialize.
